title: When you're making a deal, what's going on in your brain?
description: When two people are trying to make a deal -- whether they’re competing or cooperating -- what’s really going on inside their brains? Behavioral economist Colin Camerer shows research that reveals how badly we predict what others are thinking. Bonus: He presents an unexpected study that shows chimpanzees might just be better at it.
author: Colin Camerer
keywords: TED, talks, TEDx, behavioral economics, choice, economics, monkeys, neuroscience
